short_summary: Procurement of office furniture and installations for the 28th floor of a building.
description: Questions and Answers regarding the procurement of office furniture and installations for the 28th floor of a building.
duration_in_months: For more information, see the attached documentation
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement

**Title**: Request for Bids (RFB) - Workspaces E60PQ-140003/PQ

**Reference Number**: cb-988-90096343

**Solicitation Number**: T8080-230330-001

**Publication Date**: November 30, 2023

**Tender Closing Date**: December 13, 2023 (14:00:00)

**Amendment**: 7

## Information on the Solicitation
This Request for Bids (RFB) is for the procurement of furniture and office furniture. The procurement category is Goods and Services (GD).

## Trade Agreements and Regions
This solicitation is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). The regions of opportunity and delivery are Canada and the United States.

## Purchase Information
The expected contract start date is January 1, 2024, and the expected contract end date is March 31, 2025.

## Notice Documents and Attachments
For a copy of this RFB downloaded at [link to documents](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26070/rfb-000_en.pdf). Additional attachments include the floor plan PDF.

## Contracting Entity
The contracting entity is Transport Canada (Transports Canada), located at 330 Sparks St., Ottawa, ON K1A 0N5, Canada. The end-user entity is Transport Canada's users in Ottawa.

## Procurement Method and Evaluation Criteria
The procurement method is Competitive - Selective Tendering. The evaluation criteria for selection is Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas).

## Contact Information
For additional information, please contact Meranda Hodgson (Meranda Hodgson@tc.gc.ca) at (343) 596-5539.

**Status**
The solicitation notice has been cancelled.

Note that the "limited Tendering Reason" and "trade agreements" sections were replaced with more standard phrases. The "GINT" fields were translated and kept as information only because they do not apply to the reworded entry. The details you want to remove were excluded.

You should not have selected the "TenderDescription-section" to re-write.
